sentence.Network_en: The prison was made of reinforced concrete.
sentence.Network_cn: 监狱是钢筋混凝土结构的。

强化（reinforcement）是使有机体在学习过程增强某种反应重复可能性的力量。它是形成条件反射的关键变量。

entry.def: If something reinforces a feeling, situation, or process, it makes it stronger or more intense.

example.ex: A stronger European Parliament would, they fear, only reinforce the power of the larger countries...
example.tran: 他们担心一个更加强大的欧洲议会只会增强大国的力量。

example.ex: This sense of privilege tends to be reinforced by the outside world.
example.tran: 这种优越感往往会被外部世界强化。

entry.tran: 给予…更多支持;为…提供更多证据
entry.def: If something reinforces an idea or point of view, it provides more evidence or support for it.

example.ex: ...films that reinforce the idea that we live in a threatening and risky world.
example.tran: 让我们更加意识到自己生活的世界充满威胁和危险的电影

entry.def: To reinforce an object means to make it stronger or harder.

example.ex: Eventually, they had to reinforce the walls with exterior beams.
example.tran: 最终，他们不得不通过增加外梁来对墙体进行加固。

entry.tran: 为(军队或警察队伍)增加力量（或装备）；向（某地）增兵;增援
entry.def: To reinforce an army or a police force means to make it stronger by increasing its size or providing it with more weapons. To reinforce a position or place means to make it stronger by sending more soldiers or weapons.

example.ex: Both sides have been reinforcing their positions after yesterday's fierce fighting...
example.tran: 双方经过昨天的激战后都在向各自的阵地增派兵力。

example.ex: Troops and police have been reinforced in the southern Pakistan city of Hyderabad.
example.tran: 巴基斯坦南部的海得拉巴市已增派了军队和警力。
